mapper.insert: insert into ims_uni_account (uniacid, groupid, `name`, description, default_acid, `rank`, title_initial) values (#{uniacid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultAcid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{titleInitial,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ims_uni_account set groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_acid = #{defaultAcid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `rank` = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title_initial = #{titleInitial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uniacid = #{uniacid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uniacid, groupid, `name`, description, default_acid, `rank`, title_initial from ims_uni_account
